text:
="preserve">Ooohhh Asis is a French-Korean is a non-verbal animated cartoon produced by TeamTO and Tuba Entertainment in association with Cake Distribution based on the original show broadcast on NBC.[1] It started as a series of 1-2 minute animated series under the title Oscar's Oasis. can be viewed on the Nintendo 3DS in 3D. in co-production with PGS Entertainment, The Walt Disney Company, Universal Pictures, SGM Pictures and TF1 in cobrearction with DreamWorks.
Animated 2016.
Birdo Studio
